Articles.Content:
Hello all,

 

I'm new to KSP and I'm trying to download the MechJeb mod, but Twitch seems to think KSP isn't installed so it's grayed out.  I'm sure this is because I'm doing something wrong.  Just trying to download and install my first mod.  Any assistance would be greatly appreciated.

 

Thanks!

6 hours ago, Joe Calton said:

Twitch

KSP is best run when not using any sort of launcher.     Try running it directly from the ksp64.exe.

As for the mod, how did you install it?

I figured it out.  ckan is definitely the way to go.  At this point I may even have too many mods.  LOL!  Takes forever to load and exit.  But that's OK!  I love KSP so much!  I have a fleet of spacecraft designs, a store of subassemblies and a couple of space stations in orbit.  But I really need the 1.7 upgrade and CANNOT FIND A LINK TO INSTALL!  Creating a new post about that.  As before, I'm probably just an idiot.
